Posts.Content: kmjm wrote: Absolutely scarred to death.  Went to the doctor 2 weeks ago, she sent me the following week to have a mamogram which resulted in an immediate ultrasound, 1 week later was scheduled to see a general surgeon who same day did a core needle biopsy,(said the mas was about 3 cm and tube shaped) that was Tuesday.  I was told the results should have been in on Friday, but received a call from the nurse stating "they're still working on them", and was told to come in Tuesday and they'd have the results for me then.  Am I wrong for being so overly nervous. Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2010 04:39PM kmjm wrote: Still waiting, went to the doc today, was told that path report came back but had 2 of the best drs. in the area read them.  One said it was cancer, the other said a rare abnormal growth, so the results were sent to Yale University so that the best can look at it and give me a definite .  Either way, won't know until tomorrow or Thursday, so more waiting.  I've been told that if it can back b9 then will have a lumpectomy next followed by radiation, if malignent then of course mastectomy with chemo.
